nasaearth1943052129901445505.content: NASA is deploying two aircraft to assist with state and local recovery efforts after destructive flooding near Kerrville, Texas. Airborne instruments are collecting high-resolution imagery and radar data to help map flooding, assess damage, and more. dir="ltr" href="https://t.co/Pdixgvn6Ju" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow" target="_blank" role="link" style="color: rgb(29, 155, 240);">go.nasa.gov/4lOvEhp
